name: "Finish Them!"
effect: React: Before this fighter makes a melee strike roll: If there are more ranks in this army than in the target's army, either add twice the number of ranks in this army to the ATK for this strike, or the strike inflict an additional wound if it hits (your choice).

name: A Line in the Sand
effect:
Order: Until the end of the turn, while in your first rank each of your characters is considered to be an additional character for determining illegal ranks.
"People do not fight for neutrality, Prince Regent. Vronish Kez know that now." - Albrecht

name: Ablung's Hammer
effect:
Weapon
While you have the same number of characters in this rank as you do ranks on your army, Ablung's Hammer gives an additional +5 ATK (+7 ATK total) and this fighter inflicts and additional wound when he hits with a melee strike.

name: Achillieus' Slaughter
effect:
Order: Kill one of your characters in each rank of this army in front of this fighter: Move this fighter to your first rank.
"Where is a challenge worthy of my blade?"

name: Acts of Faith
effect:
React: Before target character performs a melee strike: Until the end of the turn, when that target character hits with a melee strike, he inflicts an additional wound.
"An a man seeketh to prove himself among the Storm's chosen, let him anoint himself with heretic blood." - Cardinal Dareh

name: Altus' Cloak
effect:
Armor * Stealth +3
Altus' Cloak gives this rogue +2 Skill for each of your characters in this rank and +1 AC for each rank in your army.

name: Anguli Mala
effect:
Free Kingdoms * Monster * Imp
You may have any number of copies of Anguli Mala in your deck.
React: After Anguli Mala enters play: Play a copy of Anguli Mala from your hand.
"I've killed enough for one lifetime, Atu. Teach me to forgive."

name: Annsi the Black
effect:
Mercenary * Monster
React: Before making a melee strike roll against a character that counts as more than one character for determining illegal ranks: If Annsi hits with this strike, she inflicts 2 additional wounds.
"Angu hath seen the signs, Crucin. The Father moveth in the sky."

name: Ar'ick
effect:
NoThRog * Elite Krun Guard
React: After Ar'ick wounds an opposing character: Inflict a -3 AC penalty to a target character in the same rank as the opposing character.
"The battle is on the field. The war is in the shadows."

name: Ar'tek
effect:
NoThRog Warlord * Powerattack +5 * Elite Krun Guard
Order: Move forward one rank.
"The thinnest webs catch the most prey, Ar'tek. If the world thinks itself free, we should indulge that fantasy." - Mekk'iah

name: Athanae's Armor
effect:
Armor * Helm * Gauntlet * Shield * Weapon
Riposte +8 * Powerattack +8
Fighters with no subclass may equip this as a fighter item.
"Behlial wore it, then Deima. None hath seen it seince." - Lord Kestrel

name: Back to Back
effect: React: Before this fighter performs a melee strike: If this fighter has no subclass, target an adjacent non-stunned character. Add the combined printed ATKs of the adjacent character to this strike. If the adjacent character is a fighter, this fighter inflicts an additional wound if he hits with the strike.

name: Backs to the Wall
effect:
Spend Order: Target all characters in an adjacent rank who share a faction with this cleric. Until the end of the turn, each target gains an AC bonus equal to the number of characters in the rank.
"The Abyss below, the Nothrog above. Find your kingdom's name quickly, Xod, or it will be an epitaph." - Valhala Abyssbane

name: Bakas
effect:
NoThRog * Misear
At the end of the turn, if Bakas has not killed an opposing character, he must preform a melee strike targeting a character of your opponents choice within one rank.
Bohst frowned as he inspected the battlefield. Several of Ar'kon's fallen had suffered attacks from behind .

name: Baron Fabrice Rellion
effect:
Deverenian
While Fabrice is adjacent to a Deverenian Hero, your Deverenians have Riposte +3 and you roll a 20 for initiative each turn.
"Such is my love for my sister, Fabrice, that I commend her husband to the Storm." - The Emperor

name: Battle Rhino
effect:
Steed * Powerattack +3
Order: Spend Battle Rhino: Move forward one rank. This fighter may perform an attack.
"Mount up, men. Bring down their artillery." - Faiza Nyota

name: Belt of Giant Strength
effect:
Order: Until the end of turn, this character counts as four characters for determining illegal ranks
Order: Oncer per turn, kill an adjacent character: Perform a +8 ranged strike that can target a character one to three ranks away. If the strike hits, it inflicts an additional wound.

name: Blinding Mirror Trap
effect:
Trap
React: After this rogue is targeted with a melee or ranged strike, discard Blinding Mirror Trap: Until the end of the turn, the acting character must succeed with a perception save (DC 17) before rolling a strike (including this one) or the strike is a critical failure.

name: Boots of Mobility
effect:
React: After being targetted with a melee strike: Move to a different position in this rank. Gain +2 AC until the end of the turn.
"Father was here just a moment ago..." - Kenia

name: Bren Glyn
effect:
Elf
Spend Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus to the roll equal to the number of characters in this rank.
"I turn my arrows on my brothers for my queen. Each time, I pray to Blood that this one is enough... And then I notch another arrow."

name: Brett Lund
effect:
Mercenary
While Brett is in a rank with at least three other characters his base ATK is +4/+1.
The Horseman parted as Orban walked past, swords drawn high in salute.

name: Brogan
effect:
Free Kingdoms * Unique
Order: Spend a Free Kingdom Character in this rank: Move Brogan forward one rank. If Brogan moved, he performs an additional melee strike (base +1 ATK) while attacking this turn.
"King or no king, we fight or we fall."

name: Bronwen Tansiq
effect:
Elf Warlord
React: Once per turn, before another target Elf plays an action card, discard a card: Until the end of the turn, the Elf gains a number of levels for using action cards equal to Bronwen's current rank.

name: Brutality
effect:
Order: If you have at least 3 other characters in this rank, perform a melee strike against a spent character within one rank. If this rogue has no subclass and hits with the strike, he inflicts an additional wound.
"Real men aren't afraid to dirty their hands." - Laird Jon Hawthorne

name: Calenar Archer
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Spend Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the number of characters in the target's rank.
"Our sister-city of Celinar has lost too much blood to elven attacks. Calinar must strike now, while there is still time!"

name: Call the Faithful
effect:
Order: Until the end of the turn, your entering characters may cause illegal ranks if you already have at least one character in the rank.
"Praise be to the Eternal Emperor, Vyacheslav Drac, and to all who live but to die for him." - Dallen Stormlost

name: Cardinal Daris
effect:
Deverenian * Unique
Melee and ranged strikes targeting your Deverenians are critical failures on any natural rolls that are equal to or less than the number of ranks in your army plus two.
"The Emperor doth need the Church alone as his savior."

name: Celinar Guard
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Spend Order: Equip Celinar Guard to a Free Kingdom Character as a Familiar item (with no attribute bonuses). White it is attached, the character has the ability: "Order: Spend Celinar Guard: Move forward or backward one rank."

name: Ceremonial Shield
effect:
Shield
This fighter is considered to be an additional character for determining illegal ranks.
React: Before fixing an illegal rank: Equip Ceremonial Shield from this fighter or from your hand to target fighter in front of the illegal rank.

name: Chained Claw
effect:
Order: Spend Chained Claw: If this rogue is in the first rank of your army, target an opposing character within three ranks. The target must succeed with a dexterity check (DC 8 + this character's Skill) or move forward one rank.
"Deverenians talk too much." - Ahdre

name: Cocoran
effect:
Elf
React: Before a character in your army casts a spell, kill Cocoran: All ranged strikes and DC saves produced by the spell gain +2 for each character (including Cocoran) in this rank.
"I am at your service, Osud."

name: Cpt. Gallagher Reed
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Order: Once per turn, target a Free Kingdom Character in this rank. Until the end of the turn, give the target a bonus to ATK, AC, Skill, or Hit points (your choice) equal to the bonus Cpt. Gallagher is receiving from another character.

name: Croupir Dythanus
effect:
Elf * Unique
Spend Order: If Croupir is in your last occupied rank, stun Croupir: A target Warlord's player discards a number of cards from his hand equal to the number of other character in this rank.

name: Crushing Weight
effect: Order: Target a character. Until the end of the turn, after each time the target moves forward, his controller must select a character in the rank in front of the target to succeed with dexterity save (DC 16) or suffer a wound.

name: Dallen's Blood
effect:
Armor
React: After a melee strike targets this cleric: The attacking character must succeed with a fear save (DC 13 + the number of characters in this rank) or the strike is a critical failure.
"Wear it and thou shalt have no other evil to fear." - Dallen Stormlost

name: Death for Death
effect:
Order: Perform a +6 ranged stike. Kill this wizard.
"All things in their place and time, Ar'tek." - Mekk'iah

name: Denskan Eagle
effect:
Steed * Familiar
+4 Skill.
Order: Spend Denskan Eagle: Move this cleric and up to one other target character in this rank backward one rank or to different positions within this rank.

name: Deverenian Courtier
effect:
Deverenian * Riposte +10 * Politician
May not attack.
"My court toyeth with me. Politickers all they gape and jest as their master toileth. So be it." - The Emperor

name: Dex Glyn
effect:
Elf
If your Warlord is Elf, Dex may enter play into a illegal rank. Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
React: After Dex falls forward from an illegal rank (even if stunned): Perform a +5 ranged strike.

name: Drac Mail
effect:
Armor
+2 Hit Points. This fighter is considered an additional character for determining illegal ranks.
"Deverenia's heart is her honor, my Lord Rellion. Whome dost thou honor?" - Corinne Drac

name: Dragon Buckler
effect:
Weapon * Shield
When this fighter hits with a melee strike, he inflicts an additional wound.
React: Before inflicting wounds with a melee strike: Select and discard up to two items equipped by the target that provide an AC bonus.

name: Dragon Fang
effect:
Order: Once per game attach a wizard spell to Dragon fang.
React: After an opposing character targets this wizard or a card attached to this wizard: Cast a spell attached to Dragon Fang as if this wizard were perfoming an order. The acting character must be the target of the spell. Discard Dragon Fang.

name: Dragon's Eye Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf * Gargoyle
React: After an opposing character moves to within one rank of Dragon's Eye Gargoyle, spend a cleric in this rank: Perform a melee strike targeting the opposing character.
"What do you mean, 'no'?!" - Ardenal

name: Dueling Saber
effect:
Weapon
Order: Spend Dueling Saber: Target a character within one rank, who performs a melee strike targeting this fighter. Perform a melee strike against the target.
"What dost thou know of honor, elf?" - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: Easy Mark
effect:
React: Before making a melee strike roll against a spent character: If this rogue has no subclass or does not have a Weapon equipped, gain +7 ATK for the strike.
"I needed new strings anyway." - Phon

name: Egik Aedroud
effect:
NoThRog
Egik has +2 ATK for each rank in your army, and performs and additional strike while attacking (base + 0 ATK) if you have four or more ranks.
"An honorary membership, but Aedroud cares who bears their name." - Kzarrik

name: Eiyamon
effect:
Elf
React: Once per turn, after a character falls forward to two ranks away: Perform a +6 ranged strike targeting that character.
"Stand down, my loyal servant. Orban's not unexpected..." - Yarr

name: Energy Barrier
effect:
Spend Order: Target a character. Until the end of the turn, while the target is in your first rank, characters may not move into opposing first ranks and opposing second ranks are never considered to be illegal.
"Oh, sit down, Max. We're going to be here for a while" - Angus Hammerfall

name: Fasolt
effect:
Mercenary Warlord
May not equip items with traits, except for Weapons.
React: After Fasolt hits with a melee strike: Target each character in the struck character's rank whose Level +8 is less than the natural die roll. Move each target backward one rank.

name: Fault
effect:
Dwarf
React: Once per turn, before Fault performs a melee strike: All other Dwarves in this rank lose -1 AC for the rest of the turn. Fault gains +1 ATK for each other Dwarf in this rank.

name: Ferrol Tremayne
effect:
Mercenary * Exile
Order: Once per turn, move backward two ranks.
"But soft, Orban... Thou hast a quest, and I a cousin who doth wish to share thy burden."

name: Fiery Bolts
effect:
Order: If there are at least two other characters in this rank, this wizard gains Marksmanship +5 for the duration of this action which may be used with this spell. Perform a +4 ranged strike.
"I do believe that Squire Orban wanted it intact, dearest Temb'w'bam..." - Regina Tremayne

name: Finlay
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Finlay has an additional strike while attacking (base +0 ATK) for every two ranks in your army.
"If we fight like heroes, we can still save Denska."

name: Flame Waves
effect: Spend Order: Perform a number of consecutive ranged strikes equal to the number of ranks in your army. The bonus of each strike is equal to the number of characters in each rank, starting with the first.

name: Flare Trap
effect:
Trap
React: After this rogue is targetted with a melee strike, spend Flare Trap: Any bonuses the opposing character received to his AC, ATK or Skill this turn are reduced to 0. His base ATK is also reduced to 0 for this strike.

name: Forceful Decree
effect:
Order: Until the end of the turn, while you have fewer characters in your first rank than each opposing first rank, each melee and ranged strike targeting a character in your first rank has a -3 penalty to the die roll.
"Calm down, Yarr. We're here for a reason, remember?" - Jianna

name: Fylgia
effect:
Mercenary
May not be targeted by actions from characters more than one rank away.
Order: Once per turn, if Fylgia is in your first rank, perform a +6 ranged strike.
"Tis a vision most inspiring, my Emperor." - Dallen Stormlost

name: Gahid's Stand
effect:
Spend Order: Spend up to one character in each rank behind this character: Perform a melee strike (base +5 ATK) for each character spent in this way. Perform an attack without spending.
"I am here, Death Knight"

name: Gate
effect:
Dwarf
If Gate is adjacent to a Dwarf Hero, the rank behind him is never illegal and other Dwarves in this rank have +5 AC.
"No. It will work. It has to." - Kiyar Undying

name: Ghed Auric
effect:
Deverenian * Stormwraith * Astral
Adjacent higher-level Deverenians have +2 ATK and +3 Skill. While adjacent to a higher-level Deverenian, Ghed Auric may be targeted by no more than one melee or ranged strike per turn.

name: Ghed Nuri
effect:
Deverenian * Stormwraith * Astral
React: After a melee strike or action targets one of your Deverenians: Put Ghed Neri into play adjacent to the target. Redirect the strike or the action to Ghed Nuri.

name: Glyph of Faith
effect:
Armor * Unique
Other characters in this rank have +1 HP. If this cleric has no other classes and no subclass, Glyph of Faith loses the Armor trait.
"Of course mortals do not understand the gods, Xod. Such is the dominion of faith." - Truth

name: Glyph of Loyalty
effect: Spend Order: Target up to three of your other characters. Attach one card from the top of your deck to each target as a Glyph. While the Glyph is attached, the character has the ability: "React: Once per turn, before this character suffers wounds, inflict a wound on another of your characters with a Glyph attached: Reduce the wounds suffered by one."

name: Golden Circlet
effect:
Helm
Order: Spend Golden Circlet and remove one card in this rank from the game: Perform a +4 ranged strike that may target a character one additional rank away.
"You can count on my loyalty, High Queen." - Rustiq Umbala

name: Grappling Crossbow
effect:
Bow
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike that may target a character one additional rank away.
React: After a ranged strike by this rogue hits, spend Grappling Crossbow: If this rogue does not have a subclass, move the strike's target forward one rank.

name: Gravity Well
effect: Spend Order: Target up to two characters within four ranks who must each succeed with a magic save (DC 8 + caster's skill) or count as three characters for determining illegal ranks until the end of the turn. If the caster has no subclass, this spell's effects last until the end of the next turn. Characters may choose to fail.

name: Hack
effect:
Mercenary * Monster
Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks. Inflict a penalty to AC on the target equal to twice the number of characters in the target's rank.
The two beasts paused over their kill, snorting at Darian...

name: Hagen's Escape
effect:
Rogues without a subclass have +2 levels to perform this action.
React: After inflicting a wound on a spent character with a melee strike: Inflict a wound on a spent character adjacent to the original target with lower AC than the original target.

name: Harassment
effect:
React: Before making a melee strike roll against a character with no more than one adjacent character: Gain +5 ATK for the strike. If this rogue hits with the strike, inflict one fewer wound than usual and stun the target.
"Ah, ah. This is between mother and son." - Kray

name: Haunted Forests
effect:
Order: Remove up to 3 characters in a discard pile from the game: Target the same number of characters in an opposing first rank, who must each succeed with a fear save (DC 8 + caster's skill) or be unable to attack for the rest of this turn.
"Go and remind the world of who did this to you." - Rustiq Umbala

name: Hawthorne's Arrows
effect:
Arrow
React: After this rogue kills a character with a non-spell ranged strike, spend Hawthorne's Arrows: Perform a +2 ranged strike targeting a character in the rank behind the killed character.
"We win by making them lose. That simple."

name: Height Advantage
effect: React: Before this fighter makes a melee strike roll: If there are fewer ranks in this army than in the target's army, either this character gains an ATK bonus equal to his level until the end of the turn, or the strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits (your choice).

name: Hesfral
effect:
NoThRog
DC saves and ranged strikes from Hesfral's spells have +1 for each Nothrog in this rank.
"If Krun does not take command sharply, all paths lead to chaos and ruin... To Wyvern."

name: Holy Infuson
effect:
React: Before a target character becomes stunned: The target becomes spent instead of stunned.
"Of course I can keep them in line, Orban. Just tell me why I should." - Jianna.

name: Humility
effect:
Dwarf
Spend Order: Discard a card: Move a Trap from your discard pile to your hand.
"I used to be 'Skill'. Got five easy reminders why that's not true, but does the new guy listen?"

name: Hungry Dead
effect:
Elf Undead * 1 Charge
React: Before Hungry Death is killed, remove a charge token: After dying, return Hungry Dead to play in its current rank and orientation, and without any charge tokens.
"Whither hast that scout betaken himself?" - Master Anandale

name: Ianavae the Condign
effect:
Deverenian * Myerdeth
React: After a melee strike targets one of yout non-warlord Deverenians within one rank, return the Deverenian and all equipped cards to the top of you deck: Cancel the strike.

name: Ikdal
effect:
NoThRog
Spend Order: Perform two +6 melee strikes. Kill Ikdal.
"Learned from the best, didn't I, Dad?" - Muddflek

name: Ilar Rowan
effect:
Mercenary
Ilar may enter play into an illegal rank.
Order: Remove Ilar from the game. At the end of the turn, return him to play in any of your ranks.
"Seek what my people and the Deverenians have, Orban, and why the Nothrog don't share it."

name: Jarz'an
effect:
NoThRog * Epic * Hero
Spend Order: If Jarz'an is in your first rank, target all characters in an opposing first rank. Perform a melee strike against each target character. If Jarz'an hits with any of these strikes, he inflicts an additional wound. Remove Jarz'an from the game.

name: Javvyn
effect:
Elf * Ethereal * Undead
React: After Javvyn is killed by a target opposing character: Attach Javvyn to the target. While Javvyn is attached, that character does not count as a character to prevent the rank behind him from being illegal.

name: Kabal Trials
effect:
Order: Discard Kabal Trials: Target a character in play who must succeed with a magic save (DC 18 minus the number of ranks away) or suffer a wound.
"Anton is gone. You know what must be done." - Zartoch

name: Kassia the Saint
effect:
Deverenian Warlord * Ebon Knight * Skyborne Path
React: Before Kassia targets a spell, kill one of your Deverenians within one rank: This spell either has +4 DC or may target characters one addidional rank away.
"Honor me thus, dear Kassia, and thou might find a throne and crown by my side." - The Emperor

name: Kassia's Bracers
effect:
Shield
Opposing characters may not use reacts during melee and ranged strikes targeting this wizard.
React: After this wizard targets a character within one rank with a spell, spend Kassia's Bracers: Increase the DC save or ranged strike produced by that spell by +3.

name: Kella Hawthorne
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike with an ATK bonus equal to the number of other Free Kingdom Characters without subclass in this rank.
"At this rate, the Free King will be here just in time to surrender to Gahid."

name: Kellis
effect:
Elf * Nimbic
While Kellis is adjacent to an Elf Hero, all Elves in your army have Marksmanship +0, may use the feat on spells, and may use the feat one additional time per turn.
"No, they're killing themselves by staying to fight me." - Lorifinnin

name: Kiyar Undying
effect:
Dwarf
Order: Remove Kiyar from the game: Ready all your Dwarves in the rank Kiyar was in.
"Our king would forsake his kingdom to save it? Insanity!" - Gate

name: Knights' Charge
effect:
Spend Order: Spend an adjacent character: Move this character and the target forward one rank.They may each peform an attack without spending.
"Huh? Goblins. Wait here." - Karkos Tzin

name: Kranig
effect:
NoThRog
React: Once per turn, after Kranig moves forward: Until the end of the turn, if Kranig hits with a melee strike, he inflicts an additional wound.
Norn growled, grinding her teeth as she crushed the letter. "Kranig! Find Hagen before Krun does, or we'll be in it up to our necks."

name: Krika
effect:
NoThRog * Sav'rukk's Legion
React: After Krika kills an equal or higher-level character: Permanently gain +3 ATK, +3 AC, +1 level, and +2 skill.
"Can't hardly fight Krun if he's gone. What now, boss?"

name: Labor
effect:
Dwarf
Spend React: Before another Dwarf in this rank equips an item: The Dwarf is +2 levels for equipping the item.
"May Kor protect you and keep you safe... Next.
May Kor protect you and keep you safe... Next."

name: Lady Grey of Calenar
effect:
Free Kingdoms
React: After Lady Grey receives a bonus to AC, ATK, or skill: If Lady Grey is adjacent to a Free Kingdoms Hero, give an identical bonus to all other Free Kingdom Characters in this rank. Other copies of Lady Grey may not react to this action.

name: Lady Keithia
effect:
Deverenian * Steel Rose
Lady Keithia has +1 ATK for each Deverenian in ranks behind her.
React: After Lady Keithia enters the first rank: Perform a melee strike.
"Truly, the dwarves know how to train their pets."

name: Laird Jon Hawthorne
effect:
Free Kingdoms Warlord * Riding +4
React: After Jon moves to a different rank: Perform a +4 ranged strike.
They stood, arrows drawn against each other. Dukat winked, and Hawthorne let his missile fly...

name: Living History
effect:
Familiar
+3 Skill
React: Before fixing illegal ranks: Put Living History in front of the illegal rank as a level 1 classless Monster with +1 ATK, 10 AC, +0 Skill and 1 HP.
"Nothing ever ends." - The Loremaster

name: Lorfinnin
effect:
Elf * Epic * Hero * Nimbic
Spend Order: Target a character 2 or 3 ranks away. Perform a +5 ranged strike against each character in the target's rank. Remove Lorfinnin from the game.
"You're throwing away your life by attacking Calix." - Kellis

name: Lorik
effect:
NoThRog
Lorik's melee strikes may target characters one additional rank away.
"If Kez lives, you won't." - Ar'kon

name: Lost
effect:
Mercenary * Exile
React: After killing a spent character with a melee strike: Perform a melee strike targeting a spend level 1 character.
"No Orban... My people have never heard of such an enchantment as afflict Yedraw."

name: Maul
effect: React: Before making a mele strike roll: If this fighter counts as more than one character for determing illegal ranks, until the end of turn he gains +5 ATK and his melee strikes inflict an additional wound if they hit.

name: Medusan Lord's Gambit
effect: Spend Order: Target up to two characters in different ranks who must each succeed with a magic save (DC 5 + caster's skill) or suffer a wound. If a target fails by 10 or more or has a critical failure, he suffers an additional wound. Characters may not react to or during this action.

name: Mephit Cage
effect:
Weapon
React: Before a character enters play, spend Mephit Cage: The entering character may cause an illegal formation if there is already at least one character in the rank.
"It follows orders, if it knows what's good for it!" - Maximilian

name: Mirin Faithbearer
effect:
Dwarf * Unique
Spend React: Before a target character suffers one or more wounds: Reduce the wounds by one and move the target character back one rank.
"You are mortal, Xod. Weak. Kor has faith in you anyway. Trust in him, and you will never falter."

name: Mountain
effect:
Dwarf
Mountain also counts as a character in the rank behind him.
React: Before an opposing character inflict a wound on Mountain: Perform a melee strike.
"Knight, we have a word for heroes like your Sir Geoffrey: villains."

name: Nayarr Hawthorne
effect:
Free Kingdoms
React: After another character in your army is killed, kill Nayarr: Give a Free Kingdom Character in the same rank as the one that was killed a permanent bonus to ATK and skill equal to the rank Nayarr was in.

name: Nightscale
effect:
Mercenary * Unique * Dragon * Stealth +6
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target and move a character in this rank backward two ranks.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.

name: Nuhad Glyn
effect:
Elf
While you have fewer characters in your first rank than each opposing first rank, Nuhad has the ability: "Order: Once per turn, perform a +3 ranged strike."
"Perhaps you need a king instead, Bren?"

name: One Among Many
effect:
React: After an aopposing character targets this character with a melee stirke or action: Until the end of the turn, this rogue gains a bonus to AC equal to the number of other characters in this rank.
Word darted about the knights' legs. They had their orders, just as he had his.

name: Out of Step
effect: Spend Order: Target a number of characters within two ranks up to the caster's level. Each target must succeed with a magic save (DC 13) or, until the end of turn, he does not count as a chacracter to prevent the rank behind him from being illegal.

name: Owl Steed
effect:
Steed * Familiar
+3 Skill
Order: Spend Owl Steed: Move this wizard and up to one other target character in this rank forward or backward two ranks.
"Try not to squirm so much, Angus, or he'll think you're food..." - Maximilian

name: Paradigim Shift
effect:
React: Before an illegal rank is fixed: Target a character in that rank. The target must fall forward to fix the illegeal rank.
"Ichaerus has made war upon the people he would lead. Tell me, Sileth, how could any accept him as king?" - Tepheroth

name: Pit Gargoyle
effect:
Mercenary * Gargoyle
Order: Once per turn, if you have another cleric in play, Pit Gargoyle counts as three characters for determining illegal ranks until the end of the turn.

name: Potion of Mist Form
effect:
Order: Discard Potion of Mist Form: Until the end of the turn, gain the Ethereal trait. This rogue may not attack for the rest of this turn.
"Delvin. Genecourt. Xaros. Dallen Stormlost." - Inquisitor Chyre

name: Prewitt the Benighted
effect:
Deverenian * Stormwraith * Astral
React: Once per turn, after one of your other Deverenians casts a spell: A character adjacent to a target of the spell must succeed with a magic save (DC 9 + Prewitt's skill) or suffer a wound.

name: Priam Ironsoul
effect:
Dwarf Warlord * Scion
Each of your ranks with at least one character in front of it holds one more character than usual before becoming illegal.
React: Once per turn, after Priam reduces wounds or removes a wounds from a target Dwarf: Ready the target.
"This not a time of men, but of heroes."

name: Ralak
effect:
NoThRog * Marksmanship +0
Order: Once per turn, perform a +1 ranged strike.
Spend React: Before performing a Marksmanship check: Ralak adds +15 to the die roll.
"Krun's missing, but we're not attacking?"

name: Regh
effect:
NoThRog
While Regh is adjacent to a Nothrog Hero, Regh gains an additional strike with a base of +10 ATK during attacks and inflicts an additional wound if he hits with a melee strike.

name: Rellion Guard
effect:
Deverenian
Your Warlord adds +1 to Initiative rolls.
Rellion Guard has a bonus to ATK and AC equal to the highest level of a Deverenian in this rank.
"An I yet live to share mine, they need no ambitions of their own." - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: Rockhome Grizzly
effect:
Steed * Familiar
Order: Spend Rockholme Grizzly: Move this fighter and up to one other target character in this rank forward one rank.
"Blasphemy!" - Uthanak

name: Royal Chariot
effect:
Weapon * Steed
Order: Spend Royal Chariot: Move forward two ranks. Succeed with a dexterity check (DC 18) or become spent. Characters who count as more than one for determing illegal ranks automatically succeed.
"I saw it myself, milady. The Duke of Myerdeth in in Denska." - Magellan

name: Salace
effect:
Elf * Unique * Priest of Spirit
Spend Order: Target a card in play within three ranks: Increase or decrease all numberals on the card by 1 until the end of the turn. Numbers may not be reduced below 1 in this manner.

name: Sanctuary
effect: Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, any time a card would be put into the discard pile, put it on top of the owner's deck instead. Players may not draw retrieve, or discard cards from their deck this turn. Each player shuffles his deck at the end of the turn.

name: Serpent's Tooth
effect:
Weapon * 4 Charges
Spend Order: Remove X charge tokens from Serpent's Tooth: Target a character X ranks away who must succeed with a magic save (DC 8 + this character's skill) or suffer one wound and, if not in the first rank, fall forward.

name: Serpentscale Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf * Gargoyle
You must have a cleric in your army to start with Serpentscale Gargoyle or bring one into play. While the rank behind him has at least as many characters as this rank, Serpentscale Gargoyle has +1 Hit Point.
"The earth did not change, Sjonegaard. You did."

name: Sewer Worm
effect:
Steed * Stealth +0
Order: Spend Sewer Worm: Move forward or backward one rank. This is a Stealth action.
"Ride it or feed it." - Trespass

name: Sigil of Salvation
effect: Spend Order: Attach Sigil of Salvation to another character. While it is attached that character has the ability "React: Before suffering wounds discard Sigil of Salvation: the chracter inflicting the wounds must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or the wounds are reduced to zero and the charcter suffers and equal number of wounds."

name: Sir Geoffrey Drac
effect:
Deverenian * Epic * Hero
Adjacent Deverenians have Defend +10.
Spend Order: Remove Geoffrey from the game: If Geoffrey was in your first rank, perform any number of Orders until you pass.
"As you wish." - Baron Fabrice Rellion

name: Sir Thomas of Celinar
effect:
Free Kingdoms *Epic * Hero
When adjacent Free Kingdom Characters hit with a melee strike, they inflict an additional wound.
Order: Remove Thomas from the game: Until the end of the next turn, when your Free Kingdom Characters hit with a melee strike, they inflict an additional wound.

name: Sister Airane
effect:
Deverenian
Spend Order: Put any number of Deverenians from your hand into play. Give a target Deverenian in your first rank a bonus to Skill and AC equal to twice the number of characters put into play in this manner.

name: Skill
effect:
Dwarf
While adjacent to two Dwarves, Skill has +3 ATK and +4 AC.
"Yes, Yes. Impregnable defenses, death traps, guards. Sooner we get back New Goldenaxe, the sooner we save the world."

name: Skrit Yscar
effect:
Mercenary * Monster
React: Before making a melee strike roll: Gain an ATK bonus for this strike equal to the current rank of an opposing Warlord.
"It's easy to be brave when Crucin's so far away, isn't it?" - Yscar the Elder

name: Slash
effect:
Mercenary * Monster
Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks. Inflict a penalty to ATK and ranged strikes on the target equal to the number of characters in the target's rank.
...then one calmly licked Windson's palm.

name: Soma
effect:
Elf
Soma may remain spent.
Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks: Until Soma readies or leaves play, the target does not count as a character to prevent the rank behind him from being illegal.

name: Sonic Blast
effect:
Spend Order: Target a number of chracters within two ranks up to the number of ranks in your army. Each must succeed with a magic save (DC 5 + caster's skill) or suffer a wound.
"Scream. Not for me, but for him." - Vakeros

name: Spirit's Bonds
effect:
Weapon
The rank behind this chracter can hold two more characters before becoming illegal, and is always considerd to have at least one character in it.
"The Deverenians are not brave, my queen, merely stubborn." - Sileth Elestra

name: Springblade
effect:
This is a Stealth action. Rogues may perfrom this action in opposing formations.
React: After a character falls within one rank of this character : The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 10 + rogues skilll) or suffer a wound and become stunned.

name: Staff of Command
effect:
Order: Spend Staff of Command: Target a character within four ranks. The target must succed with a magic save (DC 15) or count as three characters for determing illegal ranks unitl the end of the turn.
"Come, Mr Windson, we simply must talk..." - Sorscha

name: Steadfast
effect:
Dwarf
Spend Order: Other Dwarves in this rank gain an AC bonus equal to the number of Dwarves in this rank.
"What's there to worry about? It's one halfbreed army against a kingdom. Our kingdom."

name: Steady Aim
effect: Order: Target an item within two ranks. Suceed with a skill check. (DC 8 + level of the item) to discard the item. If the skill check fails, the character who has the item equipped may perform a melee strike targeting this character.

name: Sword of Truth
effect:
Weapon
Sword of Truth gives an additonal +1 ATK for each item equipped to other characters in this rank.
"I'm sure the widows and orphans would be most interested in hearing your thuoghts on means and ends, Laird Hawthorne." - Sir Erik Kaisen

name: Taika the Disjoined
effect:
Deverenian * Loth
Your Warlord adds +2 to Initiative rolls.
React: After a Warlord within one rank performs an order: Taika performs an order.
Thou know'st succession, Taika. While thy father is lord, thou canst ne'er be Lady Loth." - The Emperor

name: Tansiq Mask
effect:
Helm
Tansiq Mask gives an additional +4 AC (+5 AC total) while there are no other characters in this rank.
"Do you now, little burglar."

name: Teufeltiger's Lies
effect:
While Teufettiger's Lies is ready, other characters in this rank have +3 ATK, -5 AC, and inflict an additional wound when they hit with a melee strike.
Order: Spend Teufeltiger's Lies.
"Find him, Zaina, or the Deverenians will. I will not abide him being treated thus." - Baruuk al-Semmeya

name: The Simurgh
effect:
Familiar
+5 Skill.
React: After this cleric casts a spelll, spend the Simurgh: Target another charcter and remove a wound from the target.
"It is Modred's pet, though 'tis far older than he or I. An the Storm take the world, the Simurgh would yet be its first." - Ghed Mnettaor

name: The True Faith
effect:
Unique
ATK, AC and Skill bonus from items equipped to other characters in this rank are increaed by +2.
"An the Storm scoureth the unclean from its sight, 'tis an age of miracles." - Cardinal Creigh

name: Tonvan Veen
effect:
Free Kingdoms
React: After a Free Kingdom Character moves to a position within one rank: That character has a +2 bonus to the next ranged strike roll he makes.
"Veen's gone, Anyah... Anyah?" - Bradley

name: Tower Shield
effect:
Shield
This character counts as an additional charcter in the rank behind his current rank.
React: After this fighter is targeted with a ranged strike, spend Tower Shield: Gain an additional + 10 AC for the duration of the ranged strike.

name: Toying With Prey
effect:
Spend Order: Attach this card to a target character within 3 ranks. While it is attached, each turn after initiative is rolled, all characters in the same rank as the target must succeed with a poison save (DC 12) or suffer a wound.
"Tis just sport, Bruin. Why worry thyself so?" - Lord Kestrel

name: Trap Kit
effect:
Whenever this rogue uses a Trap, the DC of the Trap's saves is increased by +5.
"It was an accident, milord. Really." - Tripwire

name: Tripwire
effect:
Dwarf
Tripwire is +2 levels for equipping Traps.
"Don't worry, Poison. If we're learned anything here, it's how to make things fall apart just the way we wish."

name: Tseleuse Worm
effect:
Mercenary * Monster * Steed
May not equip items. Tseleuse Worm may be equipped as a level 8 rogue item (with no attribute bonus). The equipping Rogue has Tseleuse Worm's printed ability.
Order: Spend Tseleuse Worm: Move forward or backward 2 ranks.
"Try not to think about what we're riding."

name: Unison
effect:
React: After an adjacent character attacks: Peform an attack.
"This cannot last, Orban. Find me my son." - Yedraw

name: Vahala's Praises
effect: Spend Order: Target a rank. Until the end of the turn, while in that rank, chracters have the ability "React: Once per turn, before this character suffers wounds: Succeed with a Medicine check (DC 20) to reduce the wounds by one."

name: Viper's Token
effect:
If there are any characters in the ranks in front of this cleric, he is not counted for determing this rank's legality
"What have you wrought, Krun?" - Skiall

name: Vornath
effect:
NoThRog * Unique
React: Once per turn, after Vornath kills a character with a ranged strike: Perform a +5 ranged strike against a character in the rank behind the previous strike's target.
Spend Order: Perform two +5 ranged strikes.

name: Wardog Steed
effect:
Steed * Familiar
Order: Spend Wardog Steed: Move this rogue and up to one other target character in this rank forward or backward one rank.
"You. I know you. You died!" - Jonah the Burglar

name: Wyrmling Mail
effect:
Armor
Order: Twice per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Spend Wyrmling Mail: Until the end of the turn, characters must discard a card as an additional cost to target this rogue with a melee strike or ranged strike.

name: Xiantha
effect:
Free Kingdoms * Monster
May not equip Steeds. Xiantha has one additional strike while attacking (base +1 ATK) for every rank in your army.

name: Zaina's Treachery
effect:
React: Before the roll for a melee strike targeting this rogue: Equip any number of items and perform a melee strike targeting the attacking character.
"These Deverenians think us their allies. The Saladin would be amused."
